short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension gives you easy access to vehicle information from your Zubie account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sometimes you want to access information from your Zubie account, but you don’t want to open the app to find it. This extension lets you easily find vehicle information without leaving the page you're viewing. You can search by VIN or vehicle nickname.

Once you’ve searched for a connected vehicle, you will be able to see the current:
 - Fuel level or vehicle battery charge
 - Dashboard reported or calculated odometer
 - 12-volt battery voltage

We’ll also let you know if:
- any of this data is more than 24 hours old
- the vehicle is disconnected from your Zubie device
- the check engine light is on for the vehicle you searched
